attributes.action: fine government individuals if they have been judged ( by e-petition ) to have deceived the public.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The British public has been fleeced and lied to for far too long. Payback time is overdue.Make them Truely accountable and put their own considerable money where their mouths are.Fines to be set by independent bodies.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
